item.description: 이름 : 황주필 (@jupil.hwang / @namoo4u) Software Architecture, Cloud Platform, Linux and Open Source, Container Service(Docker), Java / Groovy, ML, Docker & Kubernetes, Serverless, Functions, Microservice Architecture, DevOps, Blockchain, Hyperledger Fabric […ing] Kubernetes + Istio + (Vizceral, Zipkin) Serverless with Kubernetes and Fn Project Microservices Architecture Microprofile Blockchain - Hyperledger Fabric Kotlin Arduino
